name: Death's Hangover
description: Death's Hangover is a ball and bat game, featuring horror elements, mature comedy and themes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: 2.0GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64mb graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 218 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum resolution required is 1280x720
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or above Processor: 2.0GHZ Duo core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64mb graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 218 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum resolution required is 1280x720
